amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 116-6 to require the Secretary to establish criteria for furnishing child care assistance to eligible veterans that accounts for unusual or excessive access burdens, such as excessive driving distance, geographic challenges, and other environmental factors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Kuster (NH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
